sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react';
import Avatar from '@mui/material/Avatar';
import { Typography } from '@mui/material';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import EmailIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Email';
import Link from '@mui/material/Link';
import WhatsAppIcon from '@mui/icons-material/WhatsApp';
import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub';

export default function Profile () {
  return (
      <Box sx={{
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        alignItems: 'center',
        textAlign: 'center',
        bgcolor: 'black',
        borderRadius: 5,
        color: 'white',
        }}>
          <Box> 
            <Avatar
            alt="Foto de Perfil do João"
            src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/81587343?v=4"
            sx={{ marginTop: 3, width: 200, height: 200 }} />
            <Typography sx={{marginTop: 3}} component="h1" variant="h5">
                João Victor Martins
            </Typography>
            <Typography sx={{color: '#8787A3'}} component="h1" variant="subtitle1">
              Web Developer
            </Typography>
          
          </Box>
          <Box>
            <Box sx={{marginTop: 3, display:'flex', justifyItems:'start', textAlign:'left', alignItems:'center', gap: 1 }}>
              <EmailIcon sx={{width: 20, height: 20}}></EmailIcon>
              <Box sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                <Typography sx={{color:'#8787A3'}} variant="body2">Email</Typography>
                <Link href="mailto:joaolerner@outlook.com.br">joaolerner@outlook.com.br</Link>
              </Box>
            </Box>

            <Box sx={{marginTop: 3, display:'flex', justifyItems:'start', textAlign:'left', alignItems:'center', gap: 1  }}>
              <GitHubIcon sx={{width: 20, height: 20}}></GitHubIcon>
              <Box sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                <Typography sx={{color:'#8787A3'}} variant="body2">Github</Typography>
                <Link href="https://github.com/joaovictorlernermartins">joaovictorlernermartins</Link>
              </Box>
            </Box>
            
            <Box sx={{marginTop: 3, display:'flex', justifyItems:'start', textAlign:'left', alignItems:'center', gap: 1 }}>
              <WhatsAppIcon sx={{width: 20, height: 20}}></WhatsAppIcon>
              <Box sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                <Typography sx={{color:'#8787A3'}} variant="body2">WhatsApp</Typography>
                <Link href="tel:+5548991695854">+55 (48) 99169-5854</Link>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Box>


      </Box>
 
     
  );
}
